Message:
We took some time off
our journey to visit a lake...
but to tell the truth,
I hate water...

I’ll take it slow and start
by dipping my feet in...
Aaah!

I get only one toe in,
but that’s all it takes to
make goosebumps run
all over my body,
and my tail stand
straight up.

Sabrina softly giggled
as she watched me.

“To think that you’re
scared of the water,
of all things.
I guess you are
a child, after all.”

The nerve...!
I’m already a fully fledged,
grown-up gravekeeper!
Not some kid!

I-If I get serious enough...
I can...at least...
Nnrrrggh...!

“There, there.
Everyone has something
they’re not good
at dealing with.”

The water was barely
up to my knees,
but I was already
clinging onto Sabrina
for dear life...
